drupalNodeEvent.title: “Chinese Language Talk: Immersing Yourself in the Mandarin Language”

field_speakers.processed: Li-jung Lee (UBC Visiting Lecturer, Chinese Language), Jennifer Packet (BA’19, Senior Analyst at KPMG Vancouver), and Liam LaForce (Political Science/International Relations student minoring in Chinese Language and Culture)

field_organizers.processed: University of British Columbia, UBC Department of Asian Studies

field_description.processed:
Check out @UBC Asian Studies’s next "Asian Language Talk" collaborated with @
UBC Chinese Language Program for Thursday, October 8th at 7PM, with a focus on MANDARIN CHINESE this time! Find out about exciting ways to learn Chinese such as:
- The "Chinese Bridge" Mandarin Speech Contest
- GoGlobal Program Learning in a Living Classroom in Taiwan
- Interning opportunities in China

Join three expert panelists and get ready to get motivated in learning Chinese!

RSVPs are open and ready for you now! https://bit.ly/32QhEhx
